interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Aussie Hairspray Instant Freeze Extreme Hold 7 Ounce (207ml) (2 Pack) Review Date: 2020/10/21 Store: Aussie Product Description: ['Aussie Hairspray Instant Freeze Extreme Hold 7 Ounce (207ml) (2 Pack)'] Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Scent': 'Unscented', 'Liquid Volume': '7 Fluid Ounces', 'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Brand': 'Aussie', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '4.3 x 2 x 8.5 inches; 11.04 Ounces', 'UPC': '381519078040 787734409902 038785520000', 'Manufacturer': 'Aussie'} Review Text: A tiny spritz of this not only holds my hair, but makes it look fuller.
I imagine it will last a long time; so, its also a great value.
I was always loath to try these freeze-type hairsprays, thinking they would look stiff, but this doesn’t.
No discernible fragrance, either. Review Title: Exactly what I’ve been looking for. Fantastic hold with no residue or helmet head. Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Manicure and Pedicure Nail Clipper from POWERGROOMING - Powerful Trimmer for Thick and Thin Finger Nails and Toe Nails - Included Nail File and"Catcher" for Easy Cleanup (1 Pack) POWERGROOMING {'Brand': 'POWERGROOMING', 'Material': 'Stainless Steel', 'Blade Edge': 'Straight', 'Blade Material': 'Stainless Steel', 'Target Audience': 'Women, Men', 'Package Dimensions': '3.8 x 1.3 x 1 inches; 3.21 Ounces', 'UPC': '653233212735', 'Manufacturer': 'POWERGROOMING'} I really loved the modern look of these clippers and file; however, i took one star away as the small nail file is not as sharp as I would have liked. I'm used to an old Revlon diamond file that works much faster.
As others have said, you can very easily remove the black base on the nail clippers if it seems unwieldy to you. It felt just fine to me. Super attractive clippers and file in a leather look case. Aussie Hairspray Instant Freeze Extreme Hold 7 Ounce (207ml) (2 Pack) Aussie ['Aussie Hairspray Instant Freeze Extreme Hold 7 Ounce (207ml) (2 Pack)'] {'Scent': 'Unscented', 'Liquid Volume': '7 Fluid Ounces', 'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Brand': 'Aussie', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '4.3 x 2 x 8.5 inches; 11.04 Ounces', 'UPC': '381519078040 787734409902 038785520000', 'Manufacturer': 'Aussie'} A tiny spritz of this not only holds my hair, but makes it look fuller.
I imagine it will last a long time; so, its also a great value.
I was always loath to try these freeze-type hairsprays, thinking they would look stiff, but this doesn’t.
No discernible fragrance, either. Exactly what I’ve been looking for. Fantastic hold with no residue or helmet head.
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preference:** The user appreciates grooming tools, particularly manicure and pedicure items, with a focus on modern and aesthetically pleasing designs. They are now also showing an interest in hair care products, specifically those that offer effective hold without compromising on style.

- **Performance Expectations:** They maintain high expectations for product performance, as reflected in their critiques of previous items. The latest review indicates satisfaction with a product's efficiency in providing excellent hold without stiffness, suggesting a growing interest in high-quality hair care alternatives.

- **Practicality:** The user values convenience and functionality, evident from their preference for adjustable components in grooming products. This practical approach extends to their new interest in hair styling, where ease of use and value for money are important factors.

- **Gender Inclusivity:** They support products designed for a diverse consumer base, as seen in their continued preference for versatile grooming and hair care items suitable for all genders.

- **Overall Satisfaction:** The user shows a willingness to express satisfaction with effective products, reflected in their high ratings and positive feedback, indicating a balanced approach towards quality and functionality across different personal care categories. 

This updated profile indicates that the user appreciates stylish and effective grooming tools and hair products while ensuring performance and convenience remain top priorities.
